name: HSP_ACCT_EBC_CHAR_LANDD
description: Characteristics of labor and delivery (L&D) for electronic birth certificate extract.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHAR_LANDD_C_NAME
columns.description: The characteristics of L&D category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.
entries: Steroids for fetal lung maturation received by the mother prior to delivery
Antibiotics received by the mother during labor
Clinical chorioamnionitis diagnosed during labor or maternal temperature >= 38 C
Moderate/heavy meconium staining of the amniotic fluid
Epidural or spinal anesthesia during labor
